local_intent: Complete the grasp phase for white_plate: confirm visibility, compute grasp pose, approach & align, execute pick (with a retry), and verify grasp stability and object presence.
assumptions: Perception can determine visibility of white_plate
ComputeGraspPose will publish a grasp key 'white_plate_grasp' usable by Pick
ApproachAndAlign tolerance 0.005 and timeouts 1200ms are appropriate for this scene
coherence_with_global: Subtree implements the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase consistent with the GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION stepwise plan: perception -> grasp-pose computation -> approach/align -> pick -> verification. Uses same grasp key and retries pick on transient failures.
